restaurant.name: Nepal’s Kitchen
restaurant.description: We serve Indian, Nepali, and Tibetan traditional dinner.
restaurant.ingredients: All dishes are prepared using fresh and local ingredients.
restaurant.note: We are located inside the Grandpa Café.

appetizers.name: Samosa
appetizers.description: Crispy pastry with vegetable and spices, deep fried

appetizers.name: Onion rings
appetizers.description: Onions rings fried in chickpea flour and butter

appetizers.name: Papdum
appetizers.description: Thin crispy bread deep fried, served with sauce

soup_and_salad.name: Dal soup
soup_and_salad.description: Lentil soup with spices and herbs

soup_and_salad.name: Chicken soup
soup_and_salad.description: Tender pieces of chicken with herbs and spices

soup_and_salad.name: Tomato soup
soup_and_salad.description: Tomato soup with herbs and spices

soup_and_salad.name: Green salad
soup_and_salad.description: diced cucumbers, bell peppers, lettuce, tomato, and carrots in yogurt dressing

breads.name: Naan
breads.description: Famous Indian bread made of fine flour

entrees.description: Traditional dish of India, cooked in medium thick gravy blend of spices, onion, garlic, and tomato
Cooked in oven then prepared with a creamy, flavorful sauce
Marinated pieces of meat, cooked with onion, whipped cream, coconut milk and nuts
Boneless meat cooked with fried onion, bell pepper red chili and tomato sauce
Boneless meat cooked with chopped Spinach, whipped cream, herbs, and spices
Boneless meat cooked with chopped fried potatoes and medium thick onion gravy
Boneless chicken cooked in oven and chopped with tomatoes and flavorful sauce
Basmati rice from India cooked with meat or vegetable along with blend of spices. It is served with raita.
A variety of vegetable dishes cooked in flavorful sauces and gravies

items.name: Vegetable korma
items.description: Mixed vegetable cooked with whipped cream and nuts

items.description: Mushroom cooked with flavorful gravy and peas
